wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas George Haughton (born 20 September 1994) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for National League North club AFC Fylde.

response: Nick Haughton made 14 appearances during the 2013/14 season before joining Fleetwood Town. He played in the Football League with Fleetwood and also won the FA Trophy at Wembley with AFC Fylde in 2019.
